dcterms:creator: S. Antol
A. Agrawal
J. Lu
M. Mitchell
D. Batra
Z. Lawrence
D. Parikh
dcterms:description: The VQAv1 dataset consists of open-ended questions about real images, requiring an understanding of vision, language, and commonsense knowledge. It contains 614K questions on 204K images.
dcterms:title: VQAv1

dcterms:creator: H. de Vries
F. Strub
S. Chandar
O. Pietquin
H. Larochelle
A. Courville
dcterms:description: GuessWhat?! is a cooperative two-player game where one player (the Oracle) is assigned an object in a scene, and the other player (the questioner) locates the object by asking yes-no questions. The dataset contains 822K binary question/answer pairs on 67K images.
dcterms:title: GuessWhat?!
